name: FlyBoys Flight Centers
about: FlyBoys Flight Centers, located in Griffin, Georgia, offers comprehensive aircraft rental and flight instruction for both low and high-wing aircraft. Under the guidance of owner and chief flight instructor Terry Anderson, who has over 3,000 hours of experience in fixed-wing aircraft and has been teaching since 2005, students can engage in hands-on flight training from their very first lesson. The school provides training for ratings from Private to Instructor and also offers aerial photography services. With a focus on safety and personalized instruction, FlyBoys Flight Centers ensures that every student receives the highest quality training to become a skilled pilot. For more information, contact us at (770) 228-7759.
